text:
[Verse]
Dancing shadows on the wall
Midnight whispers softly call
Neon lights they start to fall
To the rhythm one and all

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat echoes through the night
Chasing dreams in fleeting light
Stars above they shine so bright
Lost in music pure delight

[Chorus]
Feel the beat inside your soul
Let the night take full control
Move your body lose the toll
In these shadows we are whole

[Verse 3]
City breathes a silent tune
Mystic moves beneath the moon
Every shadow knows the rune
Dancing steps in perfect swoon

[Chorus]
Feel the beat inside your soul
Let the night take full control
Move your body lose the toll
In these shadows we are whole

[Bridge]
In the night we find our flame
Every shadow calls our name
Dancing in this timeless frame
Nothing ever is the same
title: Dancing Shadows
